verses.name: Isaiah 20:4
verses.text: So shall the king of Assyria lead away the Egyptians prisoners, and the Ethiopians captives, young and old, naked and barefoot, even with their buttocks uncovered, to the shame of Egypt.

verses.name: Isaiah 20:5
verses.text: And they shall be afraid and ashamed of Ethiopia their expectation, and of Egypt their glory.

verses.name: Isaiah 20:6
verses.text: And the inhabitant of this isle shall say in that day, Behold, such is our expectation, whither we flee for help to be delivered from the king of Assyria: and how shall we escape?
